titleStmt.title: Nonparametric Max-Margin Matrix Factorization for Collaborative Prediction

analytic.title: Nonparametric Max-Margin Matrix Factorization for Collaborative Prediction

abstract.p: We present a probabilistic formulation of max-margin matrix factorization and build accordingly a nonparametric Bayesian model which automatically resolves the unknown number of latent factors. Our work demonstrates a successful example that integrates Bayesian nonparametrics and max-margin learning, which are conventionally two separate paradigms and enjoy complementary advantages. We develop an efficient variational algorithm for posterior inference, and our extensive empirical studies on large-scale MovieLens and EachMovie data sets appear to justify the aforementioned dual advantages.
